Title: Establishes the disaster-related latent damage recovery grant program
Summary: Establishes the disaster-related latent damage recovery grant program to repair latent damage to public infrastructure, including publicly-owned roads, bridges, drainage and flood mitigation systems, electrical and mechanical systems and communication systems, and any ancillary infrastructure necessary for the safe operation of the components thereof, where such damage was the result of a natural disaster.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the disaster-related latent damage recovery grant program
